title: net/rpc: method receiver don't need to be marshaled by encoding/gob
body:
Hey!

In the documentation of [net/rpc](https://github.com/golang/go/blob/master/src/net/rpc/server.go#L24), it is said that the method receiver `T` needs to be marshalable with encoding/gob. From my understanding, this is not the case, only the two arguments need to be.
